name: Sunday morning political chat
reviewBody:
Sunday AM is the new show for Sunday mornings, replacing its predecessors Breakfast With Frost and the short lived News 24 Sunday.

It is hosted by Andrew Marr and each show includes at least two news bulletins, usually with Moria Stuart and a weather forecast. There is also a review of the Sunday newspapers with guests.

Most of the guests Marr interviews are politicians but actors and singers also guest.

Sunday AM is usually screened on BBC1 between 9 and 10 am and each show lasts one hour.

This has jazz type theme music, quite unusual for this type of show.
